attr.info: select what attribute for user_search SEARCH_STRING value.

get_attrs.info: If present but no attributes, then it return attributes without values of the first record found and exit. If not present then all attributes with their values are returned.

get_all_attrs.info: return all possible attributes for a person or user class object and exit

member_of.info: Or group selection. If no group selected, groups are provided from settings

size_limit.info: Define how many records per search are returned
